data_source.reference: D.S.Leonard et al., Nucl. Instr. and Meth. A 591 (2008)(10.1016/j.nima.2008.03.001)

sample.description: Copper wire from Pasternack RG217 coax high voltage cable.
sample.name: Copper wire, from Pasternack RG217 coax high voltage cable

measurement.description: For each of K, Th, and U, natural terrestrial abundance ratios were used to covert from isotopic to total elemental abundances.
